name: GMTK game jam 2022: Sokodice
description:
Sokodice is like the Sokoban puzzle game, but with dices. Very few levels are currently added.

How to play: use WASD or arrow keys to move. Push the numbered boxes to their respective goal position.

This is seshoumara's and delta's submission to the GMTK game jam 2022. If you liked our puzzle adaptation, consider joining seshoumara's Discord server for puzzle game dev: https://discord.gg/8pWpB59YKZ

Enjoy!
